Title: Act of Contrition
Writer: Gregory Patrick Agnew (original story), Amy Dallis, Tom Dallis, Sahil Sharma
Actors: Matt McCoy, Lizzy Leigh, Joe Estevez, Carrington Rowe
Plot: A dying man with a criminal past is given 24 hours to return from exile, make peace with his family and his aging ex-accomplice, but the vengeful crime boss who banished him is determined to have his revenge.
